checkoutdeliveryoptionslist.expressWarni: Please contact customer service for the exact shipping costs and lead time
checkoutdeliveryoptionslist.shipUsing.ex: For ODD we will need a valid mobile phone number. Please make sure the mobile phone number in your account is up to date. If we don’t have a valid phone number we will ship the parcel to your default delivery address.
checkoutdeliveryoptionslist.express.disc: Express delivery isn't always available on all products, please check the delivery dates in the final stage of checkout.
